name: Fluffapster
description:
THE GAME RUNS BETTER ON WINDOWS, I RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING :O FLUFFAPSTER

This is a shootemup game that is still on its prototype stage.

I hope you like the game! I will be updating it soon.

CONTROLS:

Left / Right Buttons - Navigation

Space - Shoot

Update 1.0.0.1
  • Increased player deceleration from 10% to 25%
  • Changed woolie drift calculation from (player current speed/2)/10 to 10% of player's current speed.
  • Added shooting woolies sound fx.
  • Added a room restart button (R to restart)
